channel.title: Imperium42 forum's link is flagged as "malicious"
channel.description:
(Sorry if I didn't post it in the right category, I couldn't decide where to post this. Also, this thread is just a message to the I42 staff. This isn't probably the best place to contact them, but I couldn't find a better way.)
This is surprising and weird. I checked the pinned thread on the Steam forums about the Discord channel and I42 forums, and to my surprise, the forum's link was flagged as malicious for no actual reason. In case you haven't noticed, I suggest you to check it out and do something about it.
EDIT: The same thing happens both on PC and in the Steam mobile app.

item.title: Imperium42 forum's link is flagged as "malicious"
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Why would you test it? It could have been a fake site with viruses on it that could have potentially fried your PC/Laptop. I’ve learnt from 3 laptops I used to have…

Read full topic

item.title: Imperium42 forum's link is flagged as "malicious"
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
Do you mean this page?

If so, that appears whenever you try to click a link from a Steam page that leads to a page not run by Valve. It’s normal.

Unless it was something else?

Read full topic
